00004 package PGrandom;
00005 
00006 
00007 use strict;
00008 
00009 my $multiplier = 69069;
00010 
00011 my $translate = 1;
00012 
00013 my $modulus = 2**32;
00014 
00015 sub new {
00016     my $class           = shift;
00017     my $seed            = shift;
00018 
00019     $seed    = 1 unless defined($seed);
00020     my $original_seed = $seed;
00021     $seed    =  mod ($multiplier * $seed + $translate, $modulus);
00022     my $self = { 'seed'             => $seed,
00023                  'original_seed'    => $original_seed,  # this and the next value are largely for debugging
00024                  'number_of_calls'  => 1                # there is always one call to set the seed.
00025     };
00026 
00027     bless $self, $class;
00028 
00029     return $self;
00030 }
00031 sub mod {   # for some reason perl's % doesn't seem to work for large numbers?
00032     my $a = shift;
00033     my $b = shift;
00034     $a - int($a/$b)*$b;
00035 }
00036 
00037 sub random {
00038     my $self  = shift;
00039     my $begin = shift;
00040     my $end   = shift;
00041     my $incr  = shift;
00042     my $out;
00043     $self->{'number_of_calls'}++;
00044     $incr     = 1 unless defined($incr);
00045     my $seed = $self->{'seed'};
00046     my $new_seed = mod ($multiplier * $seed + $translate, $modulus) ;
00047     $self->{'seed'} = $new_seed;
00048     unless ( $incr <= 0 ) {
00049         $out = $begin +$incr*int( ($new_seed/($modulus))*(int( ($end-$begin)/$incr) +1) );
00050     } else {                    # if $incr is less than zero return "continuous" distribution
00051         $out = $begin + ($end-$begin)*$new_seed/$modulus;
00052     }
00053     $out;
00054 
00055 }
00056 sub rand {
00057     my $self  = shift;
00058     my $end   = shift;
00059     $end = 1 unless defined($end);
00060     $self->random(0,$end,0);
00061 }
00062 
00063 sub srand {
00064     my $self = shift;
00065     my $new_seed = shift;
00066     $self->{'original_seed'} = $new_seed;
00067     $new_seed= mod ($multiplier * $new_seed + $translate, $modulus) ;   # reset the seed
00068     $self->{'number_of_calls'}=1;
00069     $self->{'seed'} = $new_seed;
00070 }
00071 sub seed {  #synonym for srand
00072     my $self = shift;
00073     $self->srand(@_);
00074 }
